about_the_game:
Investigate the evidence, expose the lies and bring the perpetrator to justice!

In Crime Investigator, you take on the role of an experienced investigator who has to solve brutal murders and complex crimes. You examine evidence, conduct intensive interviews and analyze every last lead to uncover the truth.

Will you choose right?

Every decision counts, because only with precise thinking and a tactical approach will you be able to convict the real culprit. But be warned - nothing is as it seems and every witness could be lying. Will you be able to draw the right conclusions and see justice done?

Gameplay elements

Evidence: Any evidence can be the key to solving the case.

Interrogations and dialogs: Conduct interrogations with suspects and witnesses. But be careful, the interviewees could mislead you.

Freedom of choice: Wrong conclusions can lead you down dangerous paths.

Exciting cases: Each case is unique and offers new challenges that will test both your wits and your moral convictions.

In Crime Investigator, it's up to you to unravel the truth in a web of deception, intrigue and lies. Can you catch the criminal​?

Please note that this game deals with topics such as murder and other serious crimes. It may contain content that may be disturbing or inappropriate for some players. Players are asked to take this into consideration and take appropriate precautions if necessary.
